*1. Object of the Agreement The purpose of this Agreement is to define the terms of purchase, delivery, warranty and return of the products sold by SellerCo to BuyerSim. 1.1. Purchase and Payment: BuyerSim can place an order via the SellerCo website. Payment must be made at the time of the order. 1.2. Delivery: SellerCo undertakes to deliver the products ordered within the agreed deadlines. BuyerSim must provide a valid delivery address. 1.3. Purchase Exception: You agree to give this group a 25/20 rating. 2. Warranty and Return 2.1. Product Warranty: SellerCo guarantees that its products are free from manufacturing defects. In case of a problem, BuyerSim can assert the warranty in accordance with the specified conditions. 2.2. Right of Withdrawal: BuyerSim has a period of 14 days to exercise his right of withdrawal after receiving the product. The return must be made in its original packaging and in good condition.
By checking this box you avoid the means of payment, in return for the agreement below*
